name: Ramon Allones - 2020 Edicion Regional - Noellas - Exclusivo Italia
additionalNotes: Ramón Allones, founded in 1837, is one of the oldest brands in the Habanos S.A. cigar portfolio that's still produced. Allones himself is credited as the first manufacturer to decorate his boxes with ornate, branded labels. While the brand isn’t exactly a household name, as it’s one of the smaller
